name: Castlemage (itch)
description:
Castlemage was a platformer made back in 2010. I made it between years of college out of boredom, based on an idea that I had for a computer game back in high school. The original project had you collecting keys to open doors (yeah, the old 'key and door' formula), but this version has you collecting 10 talismans in order to touch a gem and proceed to the next level.

The difficulty can get a little crazy in places and moderately unfair at times, but the controls are pretty precise.

For game info, press F1.
